original_text: “And you, take wheat and barley, beans and lentils, millet and emmer, and put them into a single vessel and make your bread from them. During the number of days that you lie on your side, 390 days, you shall eat it.
korean_text: 너는 밀과 보리와 콩과 팥과 조와 귀리를 가져다가 한 그릇에 담고 너를 위하여 떡을 만들어 네가 옆으로 눕는 날수 곧 삼백구십 일 동안 먹되

sentences.original_text: And you, take wheat and barley, beans and lentils, millet and emmer,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 밀과 보리, 콩과 렌틸콩, 조와 귀리를 가져오고,

sentences.original_text: and put them into a single vessel
and make your bread from them.
During the number of days that you lie on your side,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 옆으로 눕는 날 수 동안,
